SENT.plain: In the past decade, there has been evolution in the diagnosis, management, and long-term care of patients with infective endocarditis and its complications
This includes the relatively new but contentious prophylactic antibiotic regimen
However, these cases still continue to pose a challenge in the adult and pediatric populations
We present a case of a teenager with hypertrophic cardiomyopathy that had an atypical presentation of infective endocarditis
